text: La Mothe-Achard is a former commune. It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Vendée department in the west of France. On 1 January 2017, it became a part of the new commune of Les Achards.Arrêté préfectoral 30 September 2016 == References == Category:Former communes in Vendée
title: La Mothe-Achard
